:py:mod:`VAMToolbox.optimizer.OSMO`
===================================

.. py:module:: VAMToolbox.optimizer.OSMO


Module Contents
---------------


Functions
~~~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   VAMToolbox.optimizer.OSMO.min_OSMO



.. py:function:: min_OSMO(target_geo, proj_geo, options)

   Sinogram optimization via object-space model optimization (OSMO).

   :param target_geo:
   :type target_geo: geometry.TargetGeometry object
   :param proj_geo:
   :type proj_geo: geometry.ProjectionGeometry object
   :param options:
   :type options: Options object

   :returns: * *geometry.Sinogram* -- optimized sinogram
             * *geometry.Reconstruction* -- reconstruction from non-filtered backprojection of the
               optimized reconstructions

   .. rubric:: References

   [1] Object-space optimization of tomographic reconstructions for additive manufacturing
   https://doi.org/10.1016/j.addma.2021.102367
